data.meanings: to say/speak, to call, to be named, word/speech, utterance, a thing said, greeting, discourse, one who says/speaks. To inspire/transmit/relate/answer/think/profess, emit an opinion on, indicate a state or condition or circumstance. qa'ilun - speaker, indicator.
data.sentence: The word قِيلَ comes from the root ق و ل and is associated with the meanings: to say/speak, to call, to be named, word/speech, utterance, a thing said, greeting, discourse, one who says/speaks. To inspire/transmit/relate/answer/think/profess, emit an opinion on, indicate a state or condition or circumstance. qa'ilun - speaker, indicator.

data.meanings: (Ha-Alif-Nun) To arrive, come, be at hand (time, season), be fit, be reaped.
data.sentence: The word حِينٍ comes from the root ح ي ن and is associated with the meanings: (Ha-Alif-Nun) To arrive, come, be at hand (time, season), be fit, be reaped.

data.meanings: Proposition which points to cause, space or time. In, into, amongst, in company with, during, with, of, for, for the sake of, upon, concerning, after, in comparison, about, among, on account of, respecting, by the side of, on, by, against, according to, in respect of.
data.sentence: The word وَفِي comes from the root ف ي and is associated with the meanings: Proposition which points to cause, space or time. In, into, amongst, in company with, during, with, of, for, for the sake of, upon, concerning, after, in comparison, about, among, on account of, respecting, by the side of, on, by, against, according to, in respect of.

data.meanings: to enjoy/benefit, gift, anything useful/advantageous, goods (e.g. utensils, furniture), a commodity.
data.sentence: The word تَمَتَّعُوا comes from the root م ت ع and is associated with the meanings: to enjoy/benefit, gift, anything useful/advantageous, goods (e.g. utensils, furniture), a commodity.
